name: Dagger Hammer Axe Fight
description:
A simple fighting game for two players. You each start with a dagger, a hammer, and an axe. Then you throw them at each other. One hit kills.

Daggers fly fast but are deflected by daggers and hammers.

Hammers fly slowly but go through daggers and are stopped by other hammers.

Axes fly in an arc and do not interact with other weapons.

Deflected weapons can be retrieved and re-used.

Controllers required, Xbox 360 or equivalent.
